description:
Description of the original approval dated 30th March 2012:
- 'Construction of 2no. part eight, part nine storey blocks containing a total of 141 flats; associated car, cycle & motor cycle parking; provision of relocated
access from South Street; provision of landscaped pedestrian & cycle route linking South Street & Rush Green Road; formation of maintenance access
ramp from South Street to the River Rom Culvert; and the stopping-up of no longer required highway land. revised and additional plans received 7/3'

We have been in contact with Martin Knowles with regards to changing the existing glazing balcony panels from the original safety laminated glass specified to a perforated metal cladding. The change is required is required for a mitigation measure to improve the balcony as remove any possible issue of a glass panel shattering. P1918.11 Conditions(s) Condition 5 - This condition relates to the materials and was already discharged ref: Q0034.13 dated 10th January 2014.

Please see attached the original decision notice and discharge approval for your reference. I have also included the decision notice for the replacement cladding received last year.

We are proposing to replace the glass panels with perforated metal panels by Graepel Perforations Ltd.

Please note that the dates noted below are only referring to the year, exact dates are not known.
